title: What are some of the coolest high school level psychology experiments? - Quora

response.answer_text: I was giving a speech on common human responses, regardless of race. Universal behaviour. Couple of “non-believers” in the class. Spoke softer, and a little softer so they had to be listening. Then suddenly “HEY!!!” at the top of my lungs in my angry voice. Question: Anyone here not open their eyes wider when I did that? Some jump back, some get a raised heartbeat, - but every opened their eyes wider.
